title: Beef Goulash with Peppers
ingredients: ['150g butter (olive oil is fine too)', '4 onions, finely sliced', '50g mild or sweet paprika', '1 splash vinegar, diluted with 60ml water', '1kg beef stewing steak', 'salt', '2 garlic cloves, finely chopped', '1 small teaspoon ground caraway', '1 small teaspoon marjoram', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', '1-2 red peppers, cut into thin strips', 'black pepper']
